stories.tease: These playable mini crosswords let you get a feel for who gets included (and excluded) as clues and answers in puzzles.

author.name: Amelia Wattenberger
author.bio: is a developer, designer, and data translator. She loves creating things in any medium, be it laser cutting, cooking, or coding. She made her dog a treadmill once, two days before he tore his ACL.
